price: 3 Notre Seigneur, exalté soit-Il, ne s’est donné ni compagne, ni enfant.
arabic: وَأَنَّهُۥ تَعَٰلَىٰ جَدُّ رَبِّنَا مَا ٱتَّخَذَ صَٰحِبَةٗ وَلَا وَلَدٗا

version.title: French Translation - Rashid Maash
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Rashid Maash

meta.transliteration: wa-annahu taʿālā jaddu rabbinā mā ittakhadha ṣāḥibatan walā waladan
